title: Fintech & Crypto Tokens
description: Digital innovation is disrupting Financial Intermediation like lending, payments, asset management, and insurance. This class gives a comprehensive understanding of the FinTech industry.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MGT 3062 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MGT 3078 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
